prompts: Create a legendary electric-type Pokemon with striking yellow feathers and sharp talons.
I want a bird-like creature that embodies the spirit of lightning, with vibrant colors and fierce eyes.
Generate an electric and flying-type Pokemon that soars through storms with agility and speed.
Make a design for a majestic avian Pokemon that glows with electric energy and has impressive wingspan.
Imagine a powerful legendary Pokemon that commands thunder and lightning, with a sleek, aerodynamic body.
Show me a Pokemon with stunning yellow plumage and electric blue accents, ready for battle in the skies.
Give me an illustration of a fierce, electric-type Pokemon that resembles a bird and radiates energy.
